name: Cheung Ming Yin, Cyril
title: IT Programmer
shortSummary: IT Programmer with 5+ years experience building scalable applications. Expert in Java, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
summary: Innovative IT Programmer with 5+ years of experience developing scalable applications and optimizing system performance. Proficient in Java, Javascript and TypeScript, with a strong background in agile methodologies. Passionate about solving complex problems and continually learning new technologies.

description: Led development of NFT Marketplace and Tax Projects using React, Node.js, and Spring Boot
Built scalable backend with RESTful/GraphQL APIs, Redis, PostgreSQL, and AWS services
Optimized database performance and implemented CI/CD with CircleCI
Developed ticketing systems for Disney and Ocean Park using Angular and Spring Boot
Implemented database solutions with Redis and PostgreSQL in an Agile environment
Built real-time stock quoting system with Angular and Spring Boot
Optimized performance for 50+ stocks using web sockets and responsive design
